thread.title: Roger Milla busts out his best moves with Cameroon team following Africa Cup of Nations win
thread.title_full: Roger Milla busts out his best moves with Cameroon team following Africa Cup of Nations win

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Roger Milla busts out his best moves with Cameroon team following Africa Cup of Nations win
text:
Roger Milla busts out his best moves with Cameroon team following Africa Cup of Nations win The football legend rolled back the years to prove he's still got it Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Cameroon legend Roger Milla parties with AFCON winning side Share this video Get daily   Could   
It's quite possible that this will be the best story you see/read this week. 
In the video above, football legend Roger Milla can be seen rolling back the years to produce one hell of a dance with freshly crowned Africa Cup of Nations winners, Cameroon . 
As a former capped individual of the country himself, Cameroon winning this year's AFCON will mean as much to Milla as anyone. 
Can't quite remember why Milla is a legend? Let us refresh your memory. He's still got it... 
He scored 37 goals in 63 appearances for Cameroon. 
He lit up Italia '90 at the age of 38 by pulling out amazing dance celebrations after he scored. 
And four years later he became (and still is) the oldest man to have ever scored in a World Cup ('94). Roger Milla's goals - and goal celebrations - lit up the 1990 and 1994 World Cups (Photo: AFP) 
Despite retiring some 20 years ago, his country winning the AFCON was enough for Milla to rock out his famous celebration once again. 
But that's not all, after rocking out on his feet, Milla still has the energy to jump in the pool with Cameroon's team. poll loading What's the best football celebration? 500+ VOTES SO FAR
